title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Ed Orgeron on Recruiting Burrow, Pete Carroll & Jimmy Johnson Lessons, Transfer Portal
itunes:title: Colin Cowherd Podcast - Ed Orgeron on Recruiting Burrow, Pete Carroll & Jimmy Johnson Lessons, Transfer Portal
description:
Colin discusses the ridiculousness of MVP voting and why Oklahomans need to stop whining about Lincoln Riley leaving for USC (3:00). Then, Ed Orgeron, the famed head coach who won a championship with Joe Burrow at LSU, joins Colin to discuss the first time he met Burrow (23:00), his thoughts on his former school USC and the transfer portal (29:00), his head-down approach to the LSU job (34:00), working with Pete Carroll and Jimmy Johnson (37:00), and the greatest recruiters in college football history (41:00).

Make sure to Subscribe and follow Colin and The Volume on Twitter for the latest content and updates and check out FanDuel for the best wagering and daily fantasy action!
